mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(wcvr.id) as viewTotalNum, wcvr.external_avatar as viewAvatar, IFNULL(wcvr.external_user_name,"@微信客户") as viewBy, IF((SELECT count(wc.id) from we_customer wc WHERE wc.unionid=wcvr.view_unionid)>0,1,0) as isCustomer, wcvr.external_user_id as externalUserid, ROUND(sum(wcvr.view_watch_time)/ 1000,0) as viewDuration FROM we_content_view_record wcvr WHERE date_format(wcvr.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} and wcvr.content_id=#{contentId} GROUP BY wcvr.view_openid
